post:
Hello,

[Webh.pl](http://www.webh.pl/) is polish company founded in 2007. We offer OpenVZ, KVM and Windows VPS servers, and also dedicated servers.

We would like to invite you for exclusive offer for LET members:

- KVM VPS - 1 Xeon E5 Core, 1GB RAM, 1 IPv4 address
- 10GB SSD storage
- 100GB transfer on 100Mbps port (after that, limited to 10Mbps)
- Automatical snapshot backup
- Ability to upload and mount your own ISO using our control panel
- Location: Lodz, Poland (Test IP: 194.28.50.1)
- Price per year: 144PLN -> **~35USD** 
(after 1 year you will get extra 20% discount, after 2 years - 25%, after 3 years+ - 30%)


**[Click here to order now!](https://ssl.webh.pro/billmgr?func=register&redirect=startpage%3Dvds%26startform%3Dvds%252Eorder%252Eparam%26pricelist%3D102%26period%3D12%26project%3D1)**

After registering, you will be redirected straight into order form. Servers are deployed automatically.
You can pay by PayU, PayPal or using Wire Transfer.


**If you have any questions - ask me.**


Owner of webh.pl brand:

> ultimahost.pl Szeliga sp. j., 90-019 Łódź, Dowborczyków 25, Poland, NIP: 9671354758, REGON: 341287109, KRS: 0000423178 (https://ems.ms.gov.pl/krs/wyszukiwaniepodmiotu)
